class Matrix
{
    int b[10][10];
    Matrix () { memset(b, 0, sizeof(b)); }
    void init_I() { for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) b[i][i] = 1; }
    Matrix operator * (Matrix other)
    {
        Matrix res;
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
            for (int k = 1; k <= n; k++)
                for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++)
                    res.b[i][j] += b[i][k] * other.b[k][j];
        return res;
    }
};

Matrix quick_pow(Matrix x, int y)
{
    T res; res.init_I();
    while (y)
    {
        if (y & 1) res = res * x;
        x = x * x; y >>= 1;
    }
    return res;
}
